headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 22 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 22 airports right now. No engine anti-ice operations are currently flagged. Across base airports: 13 critical, 9 high, 8 medium, 9 normal. Key bases needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Chişinău (RMO/LUKK); plus 19 other bases. 8 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, mist and low cloud base  — most notably around Timişoara Traian Vuia (TSR/LRTR), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT). Network hotspots: Verona Villafranca Valerio Catullo (VRN/LIPX), Timişoara Traian Vuia (TSR/LRTR), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Turku (TKU/EFTU), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) and 17 others. Primary drivers: low cloud base, mist and snow / blowing snow. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 8 airports changed status, led by Stuttgart (STR/EDDS), Sofia (SOF/LBSF), Košice (KSC/LZKZ) and 5 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 22 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 200 m, cloud base around 0 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; visibility down to 2 km, cloud base around 600 ft | Timişoara Traian Vuia (TSR/LRTR) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 150 m, RVR down to 250 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties | Belgrade Nikola Tesla (BEG/LYBE) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 300 m, RVR down to 350 m, cloud base around 100 ft and 16 others. Worst affected now: Verona Villafranca Valerio Catullo (VRN/LIPX) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 100 m, RVR down to 250 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below alternate minima (current METAR) (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), approach minima limits, very low visibility) | Timişoara Traian Vuia (TSR/LRTR) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 150 m, RVR down to 250 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) | Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) — CRIT: mist; snow; visibility down to 2.5 km, cloud base around 400 ft (drivers: low ceilings, mist, snow/blowing snow) | Turku (TKU/EFTU) — CRIT: snow; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings) | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) | Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) — CRIT: fog; snow; visibility down to 500 m, cloud base around 200 ft (drivers: low-visibility takeoff restrictions, runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) and 16 others. Changed since last run: Stuttgart (STR/EDDS), Sofia (SOF/LBSF), Košice (KSC/LZKZ), Poprad-Tatry (TAT/LZTT), Eindhoven (EIN/EHEH), Varna (VAR/LBWN), Budapest Liszt Ferenc (BUD/LHBP), Plovdiv (PDV/LBPD).
